value.title: Manage data source credentials in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage your data source credentials in Power BI. value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show how to manage column headers that changes names so your power bi file does not break when you refresh it.
